paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

patients.demographics: Endemic and non-endemic areas, primarily Portuguese, French, and Swedish populations.
patients.phenotype: Familial polyneuropathy associated with autonomic dysfunction.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Early-onset familial polyneuropathy with autonomic dysfunction.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: At age 50, penetrance is 60% in Portuguese households.
Penetrance is usually high and could be about 90% at 80 years of age.

functional_data.summary: The Val30Met variant leads to familial polyneuropathy and is associated with high penetrance in certain populations.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in families, especially maternal inheritance.
variants.population_frequency: High prevalence in endemic areas, particularly in Portugal.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on multiple studies and registries.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is the most frequently reported in both endemic and non-endemic areas.
key_quotes: The Val30Met variant... is responsible for about 70% of ATTRv.
Penetrance is significantly higher when the pathogenic variant is inherited from the mother.

patients.demographics: Primarily African American populations in the USA.
patients.phenotype: Predominantly cardiac phenotype with mild neurological involvement.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The variant Val122Ile... mainly results in a predominant cardiac phenotype.

functional_data.summary: The Val122Ile variant is associated with a higher risk of heart failure.

variants.population_frequency: Prevalence of 3-4% in African American populations.
variants.evidence_level: Moderate evidence based on population studies.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is more frequently detected in the USA among African American people.
key_quotes: Val122Ile is another widespread pathogenic change more frequently detected in the USA among African American people.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
